attributes.action: UK to make illegal the selling of arms to Saudi Arabia, who are bombing Yemen
attributes.additional_details:
The UK is responsible for the death of tens of thousands of civilians and destruction of an already poor nation. Britain’s leading arms manufacturer BAE Systems have sold £15bn worth of arms and services to the Saudi military during the last five years.

“UK-made fighter jets and bombs are doing terrible damage in Yemen. The war has killed tens of thousands of people and depleted the healthcare system in a time of crisis.”
attributes.background:
The UK government and BAE Systems should stop selling weapons and services to the Saudi military. All transactions should be made illegal. 
Yemen is already experiencing a humanitarian crisis; along with the bombing which began in 2015 by Saudi Arabia, its citizens are being killed by the minute.
